additionalProperties.description: Package name and version of the package. Required format: x.x.x.xFirst number is human-understable iteration of major updates.Second one is index of backward-incompatible API changing iterationsThird is index of backward-compatible API changing iterationsForth one is for patching releases

version.description: Version of the package. Required format: x.x.x.xFirst number is human-understable iteration of major updates.Second one is index of backward-incompatible API changing iterationsThird is index of backward-compatible API changing iterationsForth one is for patching releases

target.description: Restrict this dependency to matching only a Project or a Package

dependencies.description: Each dependency is defined by a name and a version
